EmailTemplate.subject: It’s not just any Monday…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s an Internet Holiday!
We’re celebrating BIG this year and offering the first 25 new users who sign up a FREE ONE-YEAR SUBSCRIPTION using promo code CYBERMONDAY. You read that right, a FREE one-year subscription on GoDirect Trade which includes:
- Customized storefront that can be configured and launched in three easy steps. - Unlimited listings in your ecommerce store. - Zero transaction fees. - White glove customer support to ensure your store launches flawlessly.
This is one doorbuster you won’t want to miss. Launch your storefront today and see why Forbes <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/AY0T00QI20ZGJ0000q0A00X]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/f00YG0q00B00JI20QZXU000]]> and Yahoo! Finance <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/XGq00VI0Z000XY00002JQC0]]> are all talking about our marketplace. Lisa Butters Honeywell Aerospace GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Seller_Wizard]]>
